name: Apples
description: Premium quality Shimla apples, known for their crisp texture and sweet-tart flavor, grown in the Himalayan foothills.

name: Bananas
description: Organic Cavendish bananas, rich in potassium and naturally sweet, grown in the fertile regions of Kerala.

name: Oranges
description: Juicy Nagpur oranges, famous for their bright color and tangy-sweet taste, a winter specialty from Maharashtra.

name: Mangoes
description: Alphonso mangoes, the king of fruits, known for their rich aroma and buttery texture, grown in Ratnagiri.

name: Pomegranates
description: Ruby-red pomegranates from Solapur, packed with antioxidants and bursting with sweet-tart arils.

name: Strawberries
description: Fresh Mahabaleshwar strawberries, known for their bright red color and sweet fragrance, grown in the hills of Maharashtra.

name: Watermelons
description: Sweet and refreshing watermelons from Sangli, with deep red flesh and high water content, perfect for summer.

name: Pineapples
description: Golden pineapples from Tripura, known for their tropical sweetness and juicy yellow flesh.
